title: Recruiting people (Silver). Need Adc, Support, Mid and Top
body:
Add me and have one game to see if you are  worthy enough for the team. 
I play everyday after school, 3pm- 11pm.
I won't be playing today because of internet being sh*tty. (lag) i will accept your friend request once my internet is fixed.

replies.body:
I added you in game.

I am silver 5. I main Support. learning top at the moment
Hi I am a Plat 5 ADC main looking for a team. Plz add me ign: Raf

Silver 5
I play everything but jungle, mostly adc and support
I'll add you later!
Hey, will add you once I am back. I transferred accounts here. So am looking for a team to play with. I main adc/mid depending on counters. Cheers

Hey Im only a bronze player but id love to join your team, ill add you when i get home. I main Support. I main {{champion:25}}  but can play other champs like {{champion:53}}  and {{champion:117}} and am willing to learn new champs :)
Let me join you even though I am bronze I can prove to you I am worthy!
Havent played ranked yet due to travelling (until next week) but i'm silver 2 last season . Add me up and see if it suit the team. Main Support and Tanky Jungler.
Gold 3, keen to play. main jg/adc. Add me 'Beatz"

Was Silver II last season currently Bronze 1 now. If interested add Sacrifice x
Main mid role.
Not currently Silver due to unfortunate placements, but I was Silver V in pre-season - pretty confident to try out for any of the positions, log most of my games in ADC/Support/Mid
